snippet.title: Everafter Falls | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Everafter Falls! 
https://linktr.ee/everafterfalls

Everafter Falls is a lifestyle farming sim where your simulation of life on Earth is over and you are back in the town of Everafter Falls. Take care of your crops, train your pet to help you with your farm, decorate your house, explore the dangerous dungeons, and more. Features split-screen coop, automated drones, resource-harvesting pixies, a card-eating progression system, and more!
